ComicInfo.Summary: A Face in the Crowd: A man standing on a bridge contemplating suicide is visited by an angel who tells him not to do it and a devil (in the form of Spawn) who tells him the angel was trying to deceive him.
ComicInfo.Title: A Face in the Crowd
